mapper.select: select pms_task.*, pms_routine_status.routine_status_name as status_text,pms_routine_status.color as status_color,parent_task.task_name as parent_task_name from pms_task left join pms_task as parent_task on pms_task.parent_id=parent_task.id left join pms_routine_status on pms_task.status = pms_routine_status.id where pms_task.deleted_at is null and pms_routine_status.deleted_at is null and pms_task.type=#{type} and pms_task.module_id=#{module_id}

select pms_task.*, pms_routine_status.routine_status_name as status_text,pms_routine_status.color as status_color from pms_task left join pms_routine_status on pms_task.status = pms_routine_status.id where pms_task.deleted_at is null and pms_routine_status.deleted_at is null and pms_task.id=#{id} limit 1
